Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_file_type

The function AIL_file_type returns the file type of the specified file image.

S32 AIL_file_type(
  void const * data,
  U32 size
);

In Parameters

data
points to a buffer containing the file that you're interested in.
size
is the length of the file image.

Returns

One of the MILES_FILE_TYPE constants.


Group: Utility Services
Related Functions: AIL_DLS_load_file, AIL_DLS_load_memory, AIL_extract_DLS, AIL_find_DLS
Related Basic Types: MILES_FILE_TYPE, S32, U32, void const *
Related FAQs: How do I play an XMIDI file with a DLS instrument set?
